# Author Admin View Archive Link

Creates a View Archive link in the list of authors on the Users admin page.

**Contributors:** [topher1kenobe](http://profiles.wordpress.org/topher1kenobe)  
**Tags:** [](http://wordpress.org/plugins/tags/)  
**Requires at least:** 3.0  
**Tested up to:** 4.3  
**Stable tag:** 1.0  
**License:** [GPL](http://www.gnu.org/licenses/old-licenses/gpl-2.0.html)  

## Description ##

In the admin area, when viewing the Users list, each user has an Edit link.  This plugin adds a View Archive link that goes to the front of the site to that user\'s archive page.

## Installation ##

This section describes how to install the plugin and get it working.

1. Upload the `author-admin-view-archive-link` folder to the `/wp-content/plugins/` directory
1. Activate the plugin through the \'Plugins\' menu in WordPress
1. Create new or Edit a Post.
